text: Paradise in Distress is the twenty-third album by Dutch hard rock band Golden Earring, released in 1999 (see 1999 in music). The album was not issued in the U.S. ==Track listing== All songs written by Hay and Kooymans except where noted. #"Paradise in Distress" – 5:42 #"Apocalypse" – 4:53 #"Evil Love Chain" (Hay, Kooymans, E.H.
